_meta.source: Researched from Bahamas Tourism, Nassau cruise guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers downtown Nassau, Paradise Island, and beaches

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Paradise Island
transit_routes.note: Crosses Paradise Island bridge. Water taxi also available.

transit_routes.name: Walk to Downtown
transit_routes.note: Bay Street shopping starts right at the pier.

featured_experiences.name: Atlantis Day Pass
featured_experiences.note: Day passes $170+. Worth it for families. Book ahead.

featured_experiences.name: Downtown Walking Tour
featured_experiences.note: Self-guided or with guide. Pirates museum good add-on.

featured_experiences.name: Junkanoo Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: 10-minute walk from pier. Gets crowded cruise days.
